name: Moonbeam (TernaryGames)
description:
Made for the Full Moon Game Jam 2020

A platformer where you play as a shapeshifter, able to transform from man to wolf as you please.

As a human, you are slow, but your dexterity allows you to wall jump.

As a wolf, you are significantly faster, but sacrifice your vertical agility.

The game in it's current state has no objective, and is simply a large playground in which to test out your shapeshifting abilities. It's actually fairly bare-bones, with no music or sound. Animating a wolf took a lot longer than I expected (*- . -).
I may return to this game and give it the treatment it deserves one day.

WASD - Move
SPACE - Shapeshift

Stay still for a few moments to zoom the camera out, and view the level around you.
